job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of using human knowledge to enhance an AI system, which aligns with the definition of improving or fine-tuning AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions and providing feedback on AI-generated solutions, which is a core aspect of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration, even if the tools are AI-related.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system, which is a form of software integration.

soft_skills.phrase: we will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need for rapid learning and adaptation to new products within a short timeframe.

soft_skills.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the importance of self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating a need to unblock oneself without constant external help.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on applying human expertise to improve AI systems and integrating AI capabilities into customer support. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning and improving AI systems (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on integrating these AI capabilities into a customer support function and testing new AI tools (1.A.1). The role is not about developing AI models from scratch or deep specialization in generative AI techniques but rather about using and enhancing existing AI within a broader software/support context. The soft skills also point towards adaptability and self-driven problem-solving within a defined operational framework rather than deep AI research or development.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI improvement and integration within a customer support context. However, it lacks specific technical tool mentions, which would have provided more definitive classification. The profile assignment is based on the described tasks and the emphasis on integration and improvement rather than core AI model building or pure software engineering.
